plot outline: Chetan Chandra's next venture is a Kannada romantic-action film. 'Kumbha Rashi' also stars Sharath Lohitashwa, Gururaj Hoskote, Harish Rai, Biradar and Mohan Juneja in leading roles. Known for his role in 'Rajadhani', Chetan worked on his physique for this flick, the stunt sequences have been directed by Kourava Venkatesh. The film's music has been composed by Shrivatsa and Nagamma Siddhu Patil has produced it.
title: Kumbha Rashi

Known for his role in 'Rajadhani', Chetan worked on his physique for this flick, the stunt sequences have been directed by Kourava Venkatesh. The film's music has been composed by Shrivatsa and Nagamma Siddhu Patil has produced it.
